TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnvalidatedRequestValues extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 HTTP 请求值的访问权限，不触发 ASP.NET 请求验证。

span.span: Provides access to HTTP request values without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 ASP.NET 读取 HTTP 请求集合中的值 (例如) 、 和集合时，它将 执行 *请求验证*。When ASP.NET reads the values in HTTP request collections (such as the , , and collections), it performs *request validation*. 在请求验证期间，ASP.NET 检查已发布的值，并确定它们是否包含标记、脚本或保留字符。During request validation, ASP.NET examines the posted values and determines whether they contain markup, script, or reserved characters. 默认情况下，如果 ASP.NET 检测到任何这些类型的输入，则会引发 异常。By default, if ASP.NET detects any of these types of input, it throws an exception. 这有助于防止网站上出现恶意脚本注入攻击。This helps prevent malicious script injection attacks on your website. 但是，在某些情况下，你可能希望跳过 ASP.NET 请求验证，并允许包含标记、脚本或保留字符的值。However, in some cases, you might want to bypass ASP.NET request validation and allow values that contain markup, script, or reserved characters. 例如，如果你的应用程序使用丰富文本编辑器，使用户能够将 HTML 标记提交为格式的内容，则可以使用类的成员 来检索富文本请求值，而不会触发默认的 ASP.NET 请求验证。For example, if your application uses a rich-text editor that enables users to submit HTML markup as formatted content, you can use the members of the class to retrieve the rich-text request values without triggering the default ASP.NET request validation. 在代码中，可以使用属性访问此类的成员 。In your code, you access members of this class by using the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此类，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this class, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cookies As HttpCookieCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpCookieCollection ^ Cookies { System::Web::HttpCookieCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下发送的 Cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of cookies that the client sent, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的 cookie。

span.span: The cookies from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此属性，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Files As HttpFileCollection
public: property System::Web::HttpFileCollection ^ Files { System::Web::HttpFileCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取客户端上传的文件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of files that the client uploaded, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的文件。

span.span: The files from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此属性，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

span.span: Gets the collection of form variables that the client submitted, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 来自 HTTP 请求的变量形式。

span.span: The form variables from the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此属性，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

The headers from the HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RawUrl As String
public: property System::String ^ RawUrl { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取遵循网站名称的请求的 URL 的部分内容。

span.span: Gets the part of the requested URL that follows the website name, without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 遵守网站名称的 URL 部件。

span.span: The part of the URL that follows the website name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此属性，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 如果完整的请求 URL 为 `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44` ，则的值 为 `/default.aspx?id=44` 。If the complete request URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?id=44`, the value of is `/default.aspx?id=44`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Url As Uri
public: property Uri ^ Url { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在未触发 ASP.NET 请求验证的情况下，获取请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: Gets the URL data for the request without triggering ASP.NET request validation.

value.span: 一个对象，它包含该请求的 URL 数据。

span.span: An object that contains the URL data for the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用此属性，则必须手动检查数据是否存在潜在的跨站点脚本攻击。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks. 你可以从该属性返回的对象中检索 URL 数据，例如端口号、主机名、路径信息和有关用户的数据 。You can retrieve URL data such as the port number, host name, path information, and data about the user from the object that this property returns.
